content: you just ended your last round and which should be your beginning of round thread a rescue row thread through and knot it here work the next round base of tail round 11 side a * k1 p1 * side b * k1 p1 * wrap and turn row on the tail you will truly begin working in magic loop now so as you finish the last round and begin working the next one make sure to place your bor marker you ll need it for counting the bor should be easy to see since your rescue row knot is there a couple of things to remember as you work these anytime you work past a sw which won t happen until the row/rounds near the end work the sw as one stitch you can see it s an sw if it looks like there are 2 knits in a row or 2 purls in a row since you are doing k1 p1 ribbing if you get 2 of one kind in a row it must be an sw - work it as one stitch hope that makes sense work the sw in pattern if you are working along and the sw will be done on a knit stitch move the yarn to the back and do knit sw if you re working along and the sw will be done on a purl stitch move the yarn to the front and do a purl sw first side of tail ⬇ right side row tail w&t row 1 work in pattern for 17 stitches sw turn ⬇ wrong side row tail w&t row 2 work in pattern for 34 stitches sw turn ⬇ right side row tail w&t row 3 work in pattern for 33 stitches sw turn in the row above you will be making the sw right before the last sw you made hat #43 fish adult size v1 2 ⬇ wrong side row tail w&t row 4 work in pattern for 32 stitches sw turn in the row above you will be making the sw right before the last sw you made ⬇ right side row tail w&t row 5 work in pattern for 31 stitches sw turn in the row above you will be making the sw right before the last sw you made ⬇ wrong side row tail w&t row 6 work in pattern for 30 stitches sw turn in the row above you will be making the sw right before the last sw you made ⬇ right side row tail w&t row 7 work in pattern for 28 stitches sw turn in the row above you will be making the sw so that there will be 1 stitch between the last sw you made and the new one ⬇ wrong side row tail w&t row 8 work in pattern for 26 stitches sw turn in the row above you will be making the sw so that there will be 1 stitch between the last sw
